remarks: An upper bound for an operator norm.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Dec-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nmoubi.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nmoubi.y $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
nmoubi.l $e |- L = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nmoubi.m $e |- M = ( normCV ` W ) $.
nmoubi.3 $e |- N = ( U normOpOLD W ) $.
nmoubi.u $e |- U e. NrmCVec $.
nmoubi.w $e |- W e. NrmCVec $.
nmoubi $p |- ( ( T : X --> Y /\ A e. RR* ) -> ( ( N ` T ) <_ A <-> A. x e. X ( ( L ` x ) <_ 1 -> ( M ` ( T ` x ) ) <_ A ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d L x $.
$d M x $.
$d T x $.
$d U x $.
$d W x $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x $.
